comment: Dr. Sargent really cares about you. The proficiency exams are very difficult, but all INED classes use the same test. The class is hard-ish, but she tries to keep it engaging.

Hands down my favorite class I have taken so far at KSU! She is the best professor and really cares about her students. She goes a little fast through the PowerPoints, but she loves the topics she is talking about and is so passionate about teaching students how to take care of English Language Learners. Please take her she is amazing!
